content.head: Welcome to Omar Effendi Markets, the largest supermarket chain in Egypt
content.description: Omar Effendi Markets, the largest online mall in Egypt, dedicates all its efforts to provide you with the best shopping experience. In any other city in Egypt, in Omar Effendi markets, where you can buy a mobile at the best price. In addition to this, you will renew the best Egyptian and international brands such as Apple, Samsung, Infinix, Canon, Lenovo and many more. In addition, you can find all home and kitchen supplies at the best prices and brands In Egypt such as Unionaire, Kiriazi, Sony and many more

superMarket.title: Fruits and vegetables
superMarket.desription: The supermarket or the central market is a complex or a multi-section building and may be multi-storey in which shopping, buying and selling food and household items such as: food, drink, washing materials and tools, and may also contain sections for the sale of electronic devices, tools and electrical machinery, which saves time and effort The effort is to visit different areas and places for shopping, and there are some supermarkets that may contain different types of the previously mentioned items. Supermarkets and shops are distinguished by the large number of workers in various departments, and a uniform for workers is required so that customers can recognize them when they ask for help. and progress

laptops.title2: We have many laptops from all over the world
laptops.desc2: A laptop is a laptop computer known as a notebook. It is a small computer that weighs mostly from 3 to 12 pounds and is designed so that one puts it in his room while it works, unlike the computer that is placed on the desk and leaves the laptop battery with which it can work for hours without needing any other electricity and on the contrary The desktop is also distinguished by a single connection of keys to the screen with the mouse. In the past years, with the increase in people's demand for it, its spread has increased dramatically, and this is due to its light weight, ease of use and maintenance, to the extent that its sales exceeded the sales of ordinary desktop computers.
